ExportItemConfig.Query:
SELECT m.`id`, m.`usr`, m.`name`, m.`level`, m.`sex`, m.`avatar`, m.`birthday`, m.`phone`, m.`address`, m.`qq`, m.`email`, m.`reg_time`, m.`reg_ip`, last_login_time, reg_time, m.`state`, lv.name as level_name, (SELECT COUNT(0) FROM pm_coupon_bind b WHERE b.member_id=m.id AND b.coupon_id={couponId}) as bind_num
FROM mm_member m INNER JOIN mm_relation r ON m.id = r.member_id INNER JOIN pt_member_level lv ON lv.value = m.level AND lv.merchant_id=r.reg_merchant_id WHERE r.reg_merchant_id = {merchant_id} ORDER BY m.last_login_time DESC,m.id ASC LIMIT {page_start},{page_size}
ExportItemConfig.Total: SELECT COUNT(0) FROM mm_member m INNER JOIN mm_relation r ON m.id = r.member_id INNER JOIN pt_member_level lv ON lv.value = m.level AND lv.merchant_id=r.reg_merchant_id WHERE r.reg_merchant_id = {merchant_id}
